newsitem.title: USA: BOK Financial completes First Texas merger.
newsitem.headline: BOK Financial completes First Texas merger.

text.p: BOK Financial Corp said Tuesday it completed its merger with First Texas Bank and holding company First TexCorp Inc.
First Texas is a $142 million bank with two locations in Dallas. BOK Financial president Stanley Lybarger said First Texas will complement BOK in Dallas and north Texas.
In February, BOK Financial completed the acquisition of First National Bank of Park Cities, Dallas.
BOK Financial is the parent of Bank of Oklahoma NA, the largest banking company in Oklahoma, and Citizens Bank of Northwest Arkansas NA.
